short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The #1 Influencer discovery and analytics tool for Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube. Official Influencer Hero plugin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Influencer Hero: Advanced Influencer Insights

Get essential influencer analytics directly on Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok with Influencer Hero. Our free Chrome extension provides you with key metrics and AI-driven insights to elevate your influencer marketing strategy.

Key Features:

- Engagement and Growth Metrics: Check engagement rates, fake follower percentages, and follower growth trends instantly.
- Audience Demographics: Understand audience location, gender, and age to target your campaigns better.
- Earned Media Value (EMV): Estimate the financial impact of collaborations.
- AI-Generated Content: Enhance communication with personalized AI suggestions.

Easy to Use:

1. Visit an Influencer Profile: Open a profile on any supported platform.
2. Activate the Extension: Click to view a dashboard of insights.
3. Integrate and Engage: Import data into your CRM and tailor your strategies.

Install Influencer Hero for free today and start optimizing your influencer campaigns with precision!
